plot outline: Bava Maradallu is a 1994 Indian Telugu film, directed by A Kodandarami Reddy and produced by M Narasimha Rao. The film StarsRajinikanth, Ambhika, Radha, and Cass Mass in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Chakravarthy.
title: Bava Maradallu
plot: _Bava Maradallu_ (qv) is a 1994 Indian Telugu film, directed by A Kodandarami Reddy and produced by M Narasimha Rao. The film StarsRajinikanth, Ambhika, Radha, and Cass Mass in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Chakravarthy.
